articles.title: Watch Sentinel-2C launch live on the final Vega rocket - European Space Agency
articles.description: Due to electrical issues on the ground links, the VV24 launch chronology was interrupted for today. Additional checks are being conducted to confirm a new launch attempt tomorrow 5 September at 03:50 CEST (4 September 22:50 local time).The launcher …
